LanguageData.SimpleMealDesc: A simple meal, printed from one main ingredient.\n\nEquivalent nutrient efficiency to manual cooking.
LanguageData.FineMealDesc: A complex dish, printed from one main ingredient.\n\nPoor nutrient efficiency that's only worsened by a printer's single-ingredient limitation, but very tasty.
LanguageData.PasteMealDesc: A printed mixture of protein, carbohydrates, vitamins, amino acids and minerals.\n\nUtterly disgusting, but nourishing and prints with unparalleled nutrient efficiency.
LanguageData.ButtonBulkPrintBarsDesc: Bulk print NutriBars, for emergency stockpiling, caravan supplies or other uses.
LanguageData.ButtonBulkPrintBarsDescNoResearch: Bulk print NutriBars for emergency stockpiling, caravan supplies or other uses.\n\nDISABLED: Research Deep Protein Resequencing to unlock.
LanguageData.CannotBulkPrintBars: Cannot bulk print NutriBars; printer has insufficient feedstock.
